```{r}

here::i_am("r-101-grade-analysis.Rproj")
library(here)
library(vroom)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
```


## Question 1
```{r}
grade <- vroom(here("grades.csv"))
```

## Question 2
```{r}
exam <-
  grade |>
  summarise(min(Exam, na.rm = TRUE),
            max(Exam, na.rm = TRUE),
            median(Exam, na.rm = TRUE),
            mean(Exam, na.rm = TRUE))
  
knitr::kable(exam)
```

## Question 3
```{r}
na_exam <- 
  grade |>
  filter(is.na(Exam)) |> nrow()
```

We observe that `r na_exam` students did not take the exam.

## Question 4
```{r}
grade |>
  ggplot(aes(x=Exam)) + geom_bar()
```

## Question 5
```{r}
students_by_group <- 
  grade |>
  reframe(.by=Group, Id) |>
  group_by(Group)|>
  summarise(Count = n())

knitr::kable(students_by_group)
```
